## IDecoratorResolution.attempt() method

Sets attempted resolution flag indicating non disruptive resolution behavior (no exception is thrown when no registration found)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
attempt(): WithDecoratorResolverAttempt;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`WithDecoratorResolverAttempt`

- an instance of [WithDecoratorResolverAttempt](./typeioc.withdecoratorresolverattempt.md) interface
